author: SkinnyTaste
name: Air Fryer Breakfast Banana Split
instructions: Slice the banana lengthwise, 3/4 of the way through on the side of the banana so it doesn’t roll in the air fryer and open the the skin and banana slightly. Top with cinnamon and air fry 400F 5 to 6 minutes, until soft. Meanwhile in a small bowl, combine 1 teaspoon syrup with the yogurt. When the banana is ready, top with yogurt, sprinkle with more cinnamon and the nuts and drizzle with the remaining 1 teaspoon maple syrup. Optional, top with colored sprinkles and a cherry on top.
